attributes.action: mark the date of April 17, being the birthday of renowned author and media personality Henry Kelly, as a National Day of Banter, in recognition of his services to the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hereby request that April 17th be marked as a national day of banter to commemorate the birthday of renowned media personality Henry Kelly.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
